description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. ADRENALINE IS A FAST PACED, COLORFUL AND BEAUTIFUL, JOURNEY ACROSS THE ASTRAL PLANE!  WITH YOUR SUPER ACROBATIC SKILLS LIKE A NINJA, ONLY BETTER - TRAVERSE THE ETHEREAL SOLO, OR NECK-AND-NECK WITH 3 OF YOUR FRIENDS!  USES THE MEGAQUAD EXTREME II RAMPAGE-GT ENGINE FOR GRAPHICS AS SMOOTH AS A BABIES BOTTOM!

WITH YOUR SUPER ACROBATIC SKILLS LIKE A NINJA, ONLY BETTER - TRAVERSE THE ETHEREAL SOLO, OR NECK-AND-NECK WITH 3 OF YOUR FRIENDS!
